title: How to Make an Origami Box with Printer Paper

steps.headline: Fold the paper from the top to the bottom, and line the edges up nicely.
Fold the paper left to right, and make another crease.
Bring only the corner of the very top piece of paper to the left so that you have a triangle on the top.
steps.description: Make creases on the top edges of that triangle.

steps.headline: Bring the right of the triangle flap to the left.
steps.description: Make the same triangle shape again with the top layer of the paper on the right.

steps.headline: Bring the top left layer of that triangle to the right, and you should be left with an irregular pentagon shape.
Take the top flap on the left and the top flap on the right, and fold them to the middle so that their edges meet.
Flip the whole thing over and repeat step 6.
Fold the two inner corners up to form a little triangle.
Fold the whole top flap up like this.
Take the little triangles that we made and tuck them in the little pockets.
steps.description: Now flip it over and do the same thing.

steps.headline: Open it.
steps.description: To do that, you have to pick it up from the bottom and open the box. You have to use your fingers to get the edges pushed back.

text: Fold the paper from the top to the bottom, and line the edges up nicely. Then make a crease. Fold the paper left to right, and make another crease.  Bring only the corner of the very top piece of paper to the left so that you have a triangle on the top. Make creases on the top edges of that triangle. Bring the right of the triangle flap to the left. Make the same triangle shape again with the top layer of the paper on the right. Bring the top left layer of that triangle to the right, and you should be left with an irregular pentagon shape.  Take the top flap on the left and the top flap on the right, and fold them to the middle so that their edges meet. Then make a crease. Flip the whole thing over and repeat step 6.  Fold the two inner corners up to form a little triangle. Flip it over and repeat. Fold the whole top flap up like this. Flip it over and repeat. Take the little triangles that we made and tuck them in the little pockets. Now flip it over and do the same thing. Open it. To do that, you have to pick it up from the bottom and open the box. You have to use your fingers to get the edges pushed back. Enjoy the completed box!
